references.paper_title: Flamingo: a visual language model for few-shot learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the Flamingo model, which is a pioneering visual language model that demonstrates few-shot learning capabilities, and is a common architecture which SmolVLM builds on.
This paper introduces visual instruction tuning, a key approach for fine-tuning VLMs that SmolVLM utilizes.

references.paper_title: What matters when building vision-language models?
references.reason: This paper provides insights into important considerations when building vision-language models, influencing the design choices for SmolVLM.

references.paper_title: BLIP-2: bootstrapping language-image pre-training with frozen image encoders and large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces a parameter-efficient design for VLMs by freezing the vision encoder and language model, which is an architecture technique used in SmolVLM.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP which is used as a ViT model in this paper.
